title: Suspect arrested for Berclair shooting
content:
MEMPHIS, Tenn. -- A Memphis man is behind bars Saturday after police say he shot and killed two people in the 1400 block of Gherald Street in October of 2014 during a robbery.
Police say 20-year-old Antwon Young and another male approached a group of males demanding their money.
Young and the other male began shooting at the men, killing Juan Pedro Garcia and Alvaro Casillas Becerra and severely injuring two others.
Antwon Young will is scheduled to be in court on Monday.
